alert.success: We have sent you an e-mail in which you can reset your password. Click on the link in our e-mail. If you have not received an e-mail, please wait a moment and check your spam folder.
alert.error: Unfortunately your password could not be reset. Please try again later.
alert.mailNotFound: No account is registered for this e-mail address. If you think this is a mistake, please contact support (support@lern-fair.de).

passwordReset.description: Do you really want to reset your password? We will send an e-mail to {{email}}

accountNotFound.title: Login failed
accountNotFound.alert_html: No account with the e-mail address {{email}} could be found. Please check the e-mail address you entered and try again.

invalidTokenAlert.text: The token you tried to log in with is invalid. Please try to log in again.

login.title: Registration
login.error: Your login details do not match our information. Please check your details.

instructor.not-instructor: You are not yet registered as a course instructor.
instructor.not-screened: You are not yet activated as a course instructor. Please have your introductory meeting with us first.
instructor.null: You are actually allowed to create new courses ... Try registering again ...

pupil.subcourse-full: This course is unfortunately fully booked.
pupil.grade-to-high: You cannot register for this course because you are not in the designated year group. The course is intended for younger students.
pupil.grade-to-low: You cannot register for this course because you are not in the designated year group. The course is intended for older students.
pupil.no-lectures: You cannot register because no lessons have been created for this course.
pupil.already-started: You can no longer register for the course as it has already started.
pupil.already-participant: You are already registered for this course.
pupil.not-participant: You cannot register because your account is not activated for group courses. Please contact support@lern-fair.de if you would like to take part in this course.

tutor.not-screened: You cannot form a learning pair yet. Please have your introductory meeting with us first.
tutor.not-tutor: You cannot create a learning pair because you are not registered for learning support.
tutor.max-requests: You have reached the maximum number of permitted requests and therefore cannot make any more.

pupil.max-dissolved-matches: You cannot request a learning pair because you have already had too many learning pairs.
pupil.not-tutee: You cannot request a learning pair as you are not registered for learning support.
pupil.max-requests: You are already on the waiting list.
pupil.max-matches: Due to high demand, you can only have one learning partner at a time. If you are no longer working with your learning partner, please cancel the connection.
pupil.deactivated: Registration for 1:1 learning support is temporarily closed due to high demand. If you have already submitted a request for learning support, we will contact you by email in the near future to discuss the next steps. In the meantime, please feel free to take advantage of our other offers.

welcome.title: Welcome to Lern-Fair
welcome.subtitle:
Do you already have an account?
Or are you new to us and would like to register?

btn.no: No, the points do not apply

barrier.title: Important
barrier.text:
Our programs are aimed at educationally disadvantaged students. Not sure if you belong to this target group?

Then take a look at the following points. Can you answer "yes" to two or more of them? Then you are welcome to use all Lern-Fair offers.
barrier.point_1: ‚óè Your family can't help you with your homework
barrier.point_2: ‚óè Your family can't pay for tutoring for you

barrier_failed.subtitle2: We can only grant you registration after you have confirmed our conditions of participation.

description.pupil: As soon as you deactivate your account, your learning pairs will be deleted and you will be deregistered from all courses. We will automatically inform your active learning partner of this change. If you would like to become part of Lern-Fair again at a later date, you can contact us at any time.
description.student: As soon as you deactivate your account, your learning pairs will be dissolved and your courses will be canceled. We will automatically inform your active learning partners about this change. If you would like to become part of Lern-Fair again at a later date, you can contact us at any time.

buttonPromote.toastFail: Your course could not be advertised

bannerPromote.promotedTitle: Your course has been advertised again!
bannerPromote.promotedDescription: Students with the relevant interests were notified.

created.info: Your course is currently still a draft. Students cannot see your course. Before the course can be published, it must be approved for review by the Lern-Fair team.

submitted.info: Your course is currently being reviewed by us. If the review was successful, we will automatically publish your course. Students can then register directly for your course.

allowedNotPublished.info: Your course has been successfully reviewed by us. You can now publish the course and release it for registration for students.

allowedAndPublished.info: Your course is publicly visible. Students can register for your course if they are in the grade level for your course.

rejected.info: Your course has been reviewed by us but rejected. The course is not publicly visible and students cannot register for this course. If you have any questions or problems, please contact our support team.

signIn.description: Thank you for registering for this course. Our helpers offer the courses on a voluntary basis. So please arrive on time and cancel if you can't make it.
signIn.toast: You have successfully registered for the course.
signIn.error: You could not be registered for the course.

card0.title: General onboarding tour
card0.content: Would you like to know what our platform has to offer? We'll show you the most important functions.

card1.title: Onboarding tour 1:1 matching
card1.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod.

card2.title: Onboarding tour group course
card2.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod.

card3.title: Onboarding tour Help section
card3.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod.

card4.title: Onboarding tour dates
card4.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod.

popup.title: Are you sure you want to skip the tour?
popup.content: You can also restart the tour at any time. You will find the point in the help area under "Onboarding".

welcome.title: Welcome to Lern-Fair
welcome.content: We are pleased that you are taking advantage of our offer.
welcome.question: Would you like to see what our platform has to offer?
welcome.answer: We show you the most important functions.

matching.title: Learning support
matching.content: If you need one-to-one help, then learning support is the right thing for you. We will provide you with a permanent helper.

groupCourse.title: Tutoring courses
groupCourse.content: There is help on various topics in small groups.

appointments.title: My appointments
appointments.content: Here you will find an overview of your planned dates.

helpCenter.title: Help area
helpCenter.content: Here you will find frequently asked questions and their answers. You can also contact us here

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: You can change the subjects in which you need help in your profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: In this section you can make general changes and changes to your account (e-mail address, password). You will also find legal information on using the platform here.

notification.title: Notification
notification.content: You will be informed about news about your matching, new contacts and general topics. You can see if you have any new messages by clicking on the bell at the top right.

finisher.title: Done!
finisher.content: Just a moment, your personal dashboard will load.

popup.title: Are you sure you want to skip the tour?
popup.content: You can also restart the tour at any time. You will find the item under your settings as "Onboarding tour".

welcome.title: Welcome to Lern-Fair
welcome.content: We are delighted that you would like to actively support educationally disadvantaged children.
welcome.question: Would you like to see what our platform has to offer?
welcome.answer: We show you the most important functions.

matching.title: Learning support
matching.content: Learning support is 1:1 support for students who need individual help. Here you can find your appointments, your learning partners, see your requested matches and request new matches.

groupCourse.title: Group courses
groupCourse.content: Group courses offer short-term support for specific problems and questions. All your group courses are displayed under "My courses". You can also create new courses here.

appointment.title: Dates
appointment.content: All your appointments are displayed under "My appointments", arranged in tabs and sorted by date.

helpCenter.title: Help area
helpCenter.content: If you need help, you can find the most important information in our help section.

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: You can enter all relevant data in your profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: In this section you can make general changes and changes to your account (e-mail address, password). You will also find legal information on using the platform here.

notification.title: Notification
notification.content: You will be informed about news about your matching, new contacts and general topics. You can see if you have any new messages by clicking on the bell at the top right.

finisher.title: Done!
finisher.content: Just a moment, your personal dashboard will load.

popup.title: Are you sure you want to skip the tour?
popup.content: You can also restart the tour at any time. You will find the item under your settings as "Onboarding tour".

welcome.title: Onboarding tour Learning support
welcome.content: Here we show you all the important information you need to know about learning support.
welcome.question: How do I request a learning partner? How do I get in touch with my learning partner? How can I break up a learning pair?
welcome.answer: We show you the most important functions.

matching.title: Request learning partner
matching.content: You can request a new learning partner via the "Request learning partner" button on the dashboard or in the Individual section.

request.title: Make a request
request.content: So that we can assign you a learning partner, we need some information about you and your offer.

match.title: Allocation of the learning pair
match.content: After you have submitted your request, we will start looking for a suitable learning partner for you.
match.contentsec: You can also cancel your request at any time. All your requests are listed under Requests in the Single section.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: If you have been matched, you can contact your learning partner directly via the "Contact us" button in the notification.
contact.contentsec: If you would like to contact your learning partner at a later date, you can also do this via your learning partner's profile.

matchSolve.title: Dissolve learning pair
matchSolve.content: If you would like to dissolve the learning partnership with a learning partner, you can do so under "Individuals" under "Learning partners" by clicking the "Dissolve learning pair" button.

finisher.title: Done
finisher.firstContent: Congratulations, you have completed the onboarding tour for learning support.
finisher.answer: You can watch the tour again and take a look at our help section. Here you will find the most important information and assistance for you as a volunteer.

onboardingList.title: Onboarding
onboardingList.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod

offers.noMatching: You don't have an active learning pair right now
offers.waitingTimeInfo: Please note that there may be longer waiting times when looking for a learning partner. In the meantime, you can also take advantage of our courses or homework help.

contents.recommendFriends: Do you support Lern-Fair's mission for more educational equality in Germany? Then tell your friends about Lern-Fair and let's help even more disadvantaged children and young people together.
contents.recommendText: Hey, I volunteer at Lern-Fair e.V. for more educational opportunities and justice in Germany. Maybe that would be something for you too? It's really easy and completely flexible, as everything takes place online and you can take part from home. I would be delighted if you were there! You can find all the information on the website: www.lern-fair.de

homeworkhelp.title: Homework help
homeworkhelp.catcher: Do you need help with your homework?
homeworkhelp.text: Every day from Monday - Thursday 16h - 17h we offer homework help on Zoom. You can participate every day if you need help with your homework.

dashboard.noproposalsPupil: We don't have any new suggestions for you right now. Check back later!

verifizierung.title: Verify your e-mail address
verifizierung.content: "Before you can start at Lern-Fair, you must first confirm your e-mail address. We sent you an email to {{email}} on {{date}}. You haven't received an email from us?"

passwort.title: Set up password
passwort.content: The time has finally come, we are changing our login system! You can now assign a password for your Lern-Fair account and use it to log in in future.

willkommen.title: Welcome to Lern-Fair üëã
willkommen.content: We look forward to welcoming you to Lern-Fair! We offer tutoring courses on various subjects such as German, math and English. If you need individual help, you can also join our waiting list for learning support

statusSch√ºler.title: You are on the waiting list!
statusSch√ºler.content: Sobald du an der Reihe bist, werden wir dich per E-Mail informieren. Aktuell dauert es leider etwas l√§nger, denn sehr viele Sch√ºler:innen warten auf Unterst√ºtzung. Voraussichtlich musst du 3-6 Monate warten. Deine Anfrage wurde am {{date}} gestellt. In der Zwischenzeit kannst du an unseren Gruppen-Kursen teilnehmen.

interestconfirmation.title: Do you still need support?
interestconfirmation.content: Du bist nun oben auf unserer Warteliste und wir k√∂nnen dich bald mit einem:r Lernpartner:in verbinden. Brauchst du immer noch Hilfe in den F√§chern {{subjectSch√ºler}}. Wenn du ‚ÄúNein‚Äù klickst oder dich nicht innerhalb von 14 Tagen bei uns meldest, vergeben wir deinen Platz an andere Sch√ºler:innen.

kontaktSch√ºler.title: New learning partners:in
kontaktSch√ºler.content: Es ist endlich so weit, wir haben eine:n Lernpartner:in f√ºr dich gefunden! {{nameHelfer}} kann dich ab sofort in {{subjectHelfer}} unterst√ºtzen. Bitte nehme Kontakt mit {{nameHelfer}} auf und vereinbare ein erstes Treffen.

angeforderteBescheinigung.title: {{nameHelfer}} needs confirmation from you
angeforderteBescheinigung.content: {{nameHelfer}} has asked us for a certificate for your learning support. Only if you confirm this can we fulfill {{nameHelfer}}'s request.

kennenlernen.title: We want to get to know you üëã!
kennenlernen.content: Before you can start with us, we would like to get to know you in a 15-minute video conference call. Simply make an appointment with us.

zeugnis.title: Extended certificate of good conduct
zeugnis.content: Wie im Kennenlerngespr√§ch erl√§utert, brauchen wir von dir ein erweitertes F√ºhrungszeugnis, welches du unter Vorlage des Vordrucks kostenlos vor Ort oder online beantragen kannst. Du kannst dennoch sofort mit deinem Engagement bei uns beginnen und Sch√ºler:innen unterst√ºtzen. Frist f√ºr die Einreichung: {{cocDate}}

statusStudent.title: We are looking for a learning partner for you!
statusStudent.content: Thank you for wanting to support a student at Lern-Fair! We will find you someone who matches the subjects or grades you have specified. We will usually get back to you by email within a week with a suitable student.

buttons: Another learning pair is formed by
statusStudent2.title: Further engagement opportunities
statusStudent2.content: If you have the time and desire to support several students, you can request another learning partnership at any time. If you would like to teach small groups from time to time, you can offer a one-off or ongoing group course. Thank you for your commitment!

kontaktStudent.title: New learning partners:in
kontaktStudent.content: Es ist soweit, wir haben eine:n Sch√ºler:in f√ºr dich gefunden! {{nameSch√ºler}} freut sich schon sehr auf deine Unterst√ºtzung. Bitte nehme Kontakt mit {{nameSch√ºler}} auf und vereinbare ein erstes Treffen.

homeworkHelpStudent.title: Homework help
homeworkHelpStudent.content:
With homework help, students get one-off, spontaneous, direct help with their homework questions. Do you think that sounds great? Then we'd love you to join us!
Just come to the preliminary meeting from Monday to Thursday at 15:50 and support students in your subjects with their homework for about 15 minutes each between 16:00 and 17:00. Drop by, we look forward to seeing you!

homeworkHelpPupil.title: Help with your homework
homeworkHelpPupil.content: Are you stuck with your homework? We can help you with your homework quickly and easily for 10 to 15 minutes from Monday to Thursday between 4pm and 5pm. We look forward to seeing you!

pupilScreening.title: We would like to get to know you!
pupilScreening.content:
You registered for learning support at Lern-Fair some time ago. Now you have moved up the waiting list and it will soon be your turn!
Before we can find you a learning partner, we would like to get to know you. Please book an appointment for this.

shared.dissolvedAlert: Lernpaar wurde aufgel√∂st: Deine Zusammenarbeit mit {{partnerName}} wurde beendet.

blocker.title: Request support
blocker.firstContent: Do you need individual support? Then learning support is just right for you. We connect you with a helper who will provide you with individual learning support.
blocker.contentBox3: In the meantime, take advantage of our courses or our homework help.
blocker.ctaCardContent: Courses on various topics in the subjects German, math, English...

homeworkhelp.title: Homework help
homeworkhelp.textpupil: Every day from Monday - Thursday 16h - 17h we offer homework help on Zoom. You can participate every day if you need help with your homework.
homeworkhelp.texthelper: In homework help, you can spontaneously help students with their homework, just like in an office hour. Homework help takes place Monday - Thursday 16h - 17h. You can volunteer as often as you like without obligation.

modal.title: Withdraw request
modal.description: Do you really want to delete the request? You will lose your place in the queue and we will give your place to another student.

check.title: Learning support
check.content: In learning support, you help educationally disadvantaged students individually. You agree the time, duration and content of your digital meetings in your learning pair. You can form several learning pairs in parallel and we would be happy if you can support another student within your time constraints. If you can no longer or no longer wish to continue learning support, you can dissolve the corresponding learning pair here.
check.areyousuretodelete: Do you really want to delete the request?
check.noMatches: You do not (yet) have a learning partner.
check.noDissolvedMatches: You have no resolved learning pairs.
check.editRequestDescription: If you change your details, your waiting time will not change. We will inform you by email as soon as it is your turn and we have found a suitable learning partner for you.
check.noRequestsTutee: We are not looking for a learning partner for you right now.
check.noRequestsTutor: We are not currently looking for a new/further learning partner for you. If you would like to be connected with a (further) student to support them, click on the 'Create learning pair' button.

daz.heading: German as a second language
daz.description: Can you imagine supporting students who speak German as a second language and have little knowledge of German?

bulletPoints: Your family can't help you with your homework
Your family can't pay for tutoring for you
filter.heading: The 1:1 learning support
filter.subheading1: Who is the 1:1 learning support for?
filter.text1: If the following points apply to you, you can apply for 1:1 learning support from us:
filter.question1: Do these points apply to you?
filter.text2: Many pupils currently need learning support. That's why we have a long waiting list. You will probably have to wait 3-6 months before we can find a learning partner for you.
filter.question2: Are you prepared to wait 3-6 months?

bulletPoints: You need help with your studies.
Your family can't help you study.
Your family can't pay for tutoring for you.

educloud.heading: Do you already know Edu-Cloud?
educloud.text: There you will find many offers that may be of interest to you. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time.

homeworkhelp.heading: Do you already know about our homework help?
homeworkhelp.text: Do you have a question about your homework? Between 16:00 and 17:00, we from the Lern-Fair team are on Zoom and can help you with your homework.

alternatives.heading: Alternative offers
alternatives.text: Unfortunately, we at Lern-Fair cannot support you in this case. Our help is offered by volunteers. Therefore, we only have limited places and would like to help especially those students who meet the following criteria:

profiledata.heading: Update profile
profiledata.text: So that we can assign you an optimal learning partner, we ask you to check and complete your personal information once again.

howlong.heading: When did you start learning German?
howlong.alertmsg: We are looking for someone to help you learn German.

subjects.heading: Subject selection
subjects.subheading: In which subjects do you need help?
subjects.text: You can select a maximum of 1 subject.

priority.heading: Prioritization
priority.subheading: In which subject do you need the most help?
priority.text: We will try to find someone to help you in all subjects. Unfortunately, this is not always possible. You can therefore indicate here which subject is most important to you.

details.heading: Details
details.subheading: Is there anything else you would like to say to your future learning partner?
details.text: Here you can provide further information about yourself or your current situation, e.g. do you have a specific topic you need help with or is there something your learning partner should know about you? We will forward this text to your future learning partner.
details.placeholder: What should your future learning partner know about you?

heading.ver1: That's it, you're on the waiting list!

text.ver1: You are on the waiting list! As soon as it's your turn, we will inform you by email. Unfortunately, it is currently taking a little longer, as many students are waiting for support. In the meantime, you can take part in our group courses. If you have any questions, you can contact us at any time.
text.ver2: Your changes have been saved. This will not change your waiting time.

subjects.title: Subject selection
subjects.subtitle: In which subjects would you like to provide support?

profile.title: Update profile
profile.subtitle: So that we can assign you an optimal learning partner, we ask you to check and complete your personal information once again.

success.title: You've done it, you're a hero!
success.subtitle: Thank you for wanting to support a (further) student!
success.subtitle2: We are now looking for a suitable student for you. The search usually takes a maximum of one week. As soon as we have found someone for you, we will notify you directly by email. If you have any questions, you can contact us at any time.

grades.title: Grades
grades.question: In which year groups would you like to help?

tab1.title: My courses
tab1.content: Our recommendations are based on the information in your profile.

tab2.title: Recommendations
tab2.content: Our recommendations are based on the information in your profile.

tab3.title: All offers
tab3.content: Our recommendations are based on the information in your profile.

error.nofound: No courses were found. Please adjust your search.

pupil.title: Offers
pupil.content: On this page you will find your courses, recommendations for you and other offers. Looking for something special? Then use our search function.

alert.successfulEditing: Your course has been successfully completed.
alert.successfulCreation: Your course has been successfully created. If you have not released it for review immediately, please don't forget to do so. This is the only way we can publish your course in time.

helper.title: Group courses
helper.content: In our courses, you have the opportunity to help several students at once. We offer different course formats: Tutoring courses, focus courses and 'German for beginners'.

modal.title: Why do you want to dissolve the learning pair?

warningModal.title: Are you sure?
warningModal.body: Sometimes it takes a while for your counterpart to get back to you. We have conducted introductory interviews with all students and assessed their need for learning support. We therefore recommend that you wait at least 14 days for feedback before dissolving the learning pair.

newMatch.title: Form a new learning pair
newMatch.descriptionPupil: Would you like to be connected with a new learning partner? Please note that it will take some time before we can find someone for you.
newMatch.descriptionStudent: Would you like to be connected with a new learning partner? We are happy if you support (another) student. Thank you for your commitment!

student.ghosted: My learning partner did not get back to me
student.isOfNoHelp: I could not help my learning partner
student.noMoreTime: I no longer have time to support my learning partner
student.noMoreHelpNeeded: My learning partner no longer needs support
student.personalIssues: We had difficulties on an interpersonal level
student.scheduleIssues: We could not find any common dates

pupil.ghosted: My learning partner did not get back to me
pupil.isOfNoHelp: My learning partner could not help me
pupil.noMoreTime: My learning partner no longer has time to support me
pupil.personalIssues: We had difficulties on an interpersonal level
pupil.scheduleIssues: We could not find any common dates

certificate.title: Learning support from {{firstname}}
certificate.requestInstructions: {{firstname}} kann die Informationen in seinem:ihrem Userbereich anpassen.
certificate.areYou18: Are you of legal age (18 years or older)?
certificate.signInstructionsParents: On the following page, your parents must sign to confirm that {{firstname}} has supported you.
certificate.successInfo: Thank you for supporting us in recognizing the work of our helpers.

adHocMeeting.title: Start immediate meeting
adHocMeeting.infoText: We will automatically create an appointment for you and inform your student by email as soon as you start an instant meeting. In principle, you can also plan and create appointments with your student in advance in the user area.

result.success: Your video conference has been successfully entered.
result.error: Your video conference could not be entered.

modal.title: Start video call
modal.text: Enter the link to the video conference here

hint.pupil: You can only start the meeting 10 minutes before the start of an appointment.
hint.student: You can start the meeting 4 hours before the start of the appointment.

cta.title: Onboarding tour Group courses
cta.content: If you are not yet sure whether the format of the tutoring courses really suits you, click through the onboarding for group tutoring and get a more precise idea of the activity.

student.title: The group courses
student.firstContent: You help an educationally disadvantaged student to close knowledge gaps in a group format. The frequency, frequency and duration of the digital meetings is entirely up to you!
student.secContent: You can find more information about our tutoring courses
student.content: You are currently not yet activated for the group courses, but scroll through the next process steps here to find out how to change this:

appointments.headline: When should the course take place?

error.course: Sorry, your course could not be created. Please try again.
error.subcourse: Sorry, your course could not be created. Please try again.
error.upload_image: Sorry, your picture could not be uploaded.
error.set_image: Unfortunately, your image could not be set as a course image.
error.instructors: One or more instructors could not be added.
error.lectures: One or more dates could not be added.
error.tags: Your tags could not be added.

form.courseAlreadyaAddedLead: You have already added this person.
form.shortDescriptionPlaceholder: A short sentence about what your course is about ...
form.tagsPlaceholder: So that your course is easier to find
form.tagsInfo: The individual tags must be separated by a comma (,)
form.detailsContent: For which classes is the course suitable?
form.maxMembersInfo: Please indicate a higher number, as usually only half of the registered students show up.
form.otherOptionStart: Students can register after the first course date
form.allowChatContact: Allow participants to write in the chat
form.prospectContactTooltip: Students who are interested in your course (before the course starts)
form.participantsContactTooltip: Students who have registered for your course
form.otherOptionStartToolTip: If you activate this option, students can register for your course at any time. In particular, they can also register if one or more lessons have already taken place.

Wizard.headline: Date
Wizard.dateInfo: A course must be created 7 days before the start of the course.

Preview.headline: Check details
Preview.content: Please check the details again before you publish your course.
Preview.startDateLabel: Join after the start of the course:

modal.headline: Done!
modal.content: Thank you, your course has been saved and sent to us. After checking and approving the content, your course will be activated and will be publicly visible. This will happen within the next 7 days.

unsplash.heading: Choose a picture
unsplash.description: Search for a meaningful image for your course topic using the search bar. You cannot currently use your own images.

addCourseInstructor.notFound: No search results - Enter the full name or e-mail of the instructor to find her

empty.nocourses: You are not currently offering a course.
empty.noremissionordraft: You currently have no course draft and no course released for review.
empty.nopastcourses: You have not yet offered a course with us.

cancel.description: If you cancel the course, all dates will be canceled and the participating students will be informed of this change by email. Are you sure you want to cancel the course?

course.noticeDate: Please fill in all fields correctly

leavePageModal.text: You are about to leave Lern-Fair
leavePageModal.description: You will be redirected to the following page

chat.title: Chat messages
chat.modalBody: We will send you an e-mail for every chat message you receive.

survey.title: Feedback & surveys
survey.modalBody: We want you to be satisfied with Lern Fair. That's why we occasionally send you feedback questionnaires to hear about your experiences. We would be delighted if you would pass on feedback, ideas and suggestions for improvement to us in this way.

appointment.title: Date note
appointment.modalBody: We will inform you about new dates with your learning partners and in courses. We will also remind you of the lesson shortly before it starts.

advice.title: Learning tips & assistance
advice.modalBody: Learning must be learned. We help you prepare for your lessons with training courses and materials, while also sending you the best tips to maximize your learning progress. This will keep you motivated and save you valuable time.

suggestion.title: Course suggestions
suggestion.modalBody: We regularly upload exciting new courses to our platform. If a suitable course is offered for your year group and your subjects, you will receive a notification from us. You can change your subjects and therefore your interests in your profile at any time.

announcement.title: Important changes
announcement.modalBody: If the functionality of Lern-Fair changes significantly or there are new programs, we will inform you about important changes.

call.title: Call for commitment
call.modalBody: We will let you know if there is a particular need for support at any given time and explain how you can best campaign for more educational equality with us.

news.title: News from Lern-Fair
news.modalBody: We would like to inform you about new features and functions and draw your attention to benefits that you can receive via Lern-Fair.

event.title: events
event.modalBody: At Lern-Fair, we regularly organize cool events and valuable training courses. We keep you up to date and connect you with other users on our platform.

request.title: Wanted
request.modalBody: For interviews, press articles or local campaigns, we are sometimes looking for helpers and students who would like to take part in Lern-Fair and report on their experiences. We are also looking for test subjects for our app, our website or a new program.

alternative.title: Notes on alternative offers
alternative.modalBody: Lern-Fair is a great support option for students. But there are also many other helpful programs, useful apps or social organizations. If we find something suitable for you, we will let you know and hope that you can benefit from the offer.

system.title: System
system.description: System notifications are displayed within the app (on the bell in the header). Here you can set whether you would also like to be notified by email.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description:
Newsletters are only sent by e-mail.
Here you can set which types of mail you would like to receive.

leftVideoChat.title: You have left the video chat
leftVideoChat.subtitle: We hope you enjoyed the course!

leftVideoChat.title: You have left the video chat
leftVideoChat.subtitle: We hope you enjoyed the 1:1 learning support!

report.modalMessage: Are you sure you want to report this message? We will review the message in the coming days and delete it if it violates our guidelines.

chat.title: Chat
chat.hint: You can only open the group chat if at least two students have registered for your course.
chat.noContactOptionsHint: Your learning pairs and group chats with which you can chat are listed here.

courseTypes.groupCourses: In our courses, you have the opportunity to help several students at once. We offer different course formats:
courseTypes.oneToOneLearningSupport: With Lern-Fair tutoring, we connect you with a student to form a learning pair. These students have a special need for individual help with school subjects.

modal.headline: New role
modal.desc: We are delighted that you are interested in continuing your involvement with Lern-Fair. As you have already had an introductory meeting with us, you know your way around. We will get back to you by e-mail as soon as we have activated the additional role for you.

matchDescription.first: Together you determine topics and content
matchDescription.second: You determine the time of the tutoring
matchDescription.third: You meet once a week, over a period of time that you have decided together
matchDescription.fourth: Are you good at math, German or English? Great, because these tutors are urgently needed!

groupDescription.first: In the tutoring courses, you help students who want to improve in a specific school subject. Subjects from the main subjects (German, math, English) are particularly in demand. The courses usually take place weekly for a maximum of 12 weeks.
groupDescription.second: With "German for Beginners", you can help refugee students learn German. We provide you with teaching materials so that you can design courses that focus on speaking and practicing. The courses take place weekly.
groupDescription.third: In the focus courses, you can work with students on extracurricular topics. We organize various themed months throughout the year. The courses usually take place as individual appointments.

coaching.online: Lern-Fair offers you free online training courses from experts. If you do not yet have any experience in course management, we would like to ask you to take part. You can find current training dates on our website, please register here:
coaching.materials: In the help section you will find materials to help you prepare and run the courses:
coaching.one: Lists of typical school topics in the main subjects
coaching.two: Free license for the Sofatutor learning app

language.one: Lern-Fair offers you free online training courses from experts. If you do not yet have any experience in course management, we would like to ask you to take part. You can find current training dates on our website, please register here:
language.two: In the help section you will find materials to help you prepare and run the courses.

focus.one: As we structure the focus courses in themed months, we ask you to discuss the content of your topic with us before setting up your course. Please visit our website to find out about the planned focus months and contact us with your proposed topic at

banner.text: We will get back to you by e-mail as soon as we have activated the additional role for you.

introduction.imageGroupText: Pass on your knowledge and lead group courses.
introduction.imageMatchText: With just 1-2 hours a week, you can give an educationally disadvantaged child the chance of a better future.
introduction.groupRequestedDescription: Thank you for your interest in becoming a course leader. Before you can start your course, we have a few more tips for you:

search.placeholder: Name or e-mail of a student or helper
search.not_found: Search for the full name or e-mail of a student or helper

screening.title: Screening
screening.howto: Use the search bar to find the student or helper you want to screen.
screening.was_screened_but_no_decision: This student has already been screened, but a decision is still pending
screening.account_deactivated_details: The student can no longer log in to the user area. Support can reactivate accounts.
screening.confirm_rejection: Do you really want to {{firstname}} {{lastname}} really reject it?
screening.confirm_deactivate: Do you really want to {{firstname}} {{lastname}} really deactivate?
screening.no_open_screening_long: The student does not have an open screening where a case decision is pending.

request.title: Apply for a certificate
request.subtitle: We would like to thank you for your commitment to Lern-Fair! We will be happy to issue you with a certificate for your work.
request.subtitle2: A complete Lern Fair certificate consists of the following two parts:
request.procedure: You can apply for the certificate here and will receive a notification as soon as your commitment has been confirmed by your student. From then on, you will also find the certificate in your profile.

activities.title: Activity
activities.subtitle: Select the activities with which you supported your learning partners
activities.preparation: Preparation, planning and organization of lessons
activities.visualization_digital: Digital preparation and illustration of lesson content
activities.repetition: Consolidation and repetition of lesson content
activities.homework: Working on exercises and homework together

request_for_match.title: Details
request_for_match.subtitle: For each student, indicate the extent to which you have supported them.
request_for_match.not_a_number: You must enter a number here.

download.error: An error occurred during the download

issueReporter.title: An error has occurred
issueReporter.subtitle: Sorry, this should not happen. The tech team has been informed and is taking care of the error. If you have any questions, please contact support

set_password.title: Reset password
set_password.error: An error has occurred. Please try again.
set_password.success_subtitle: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now log in with the new password
set_password.failure_subtitle: Sorry, your password could not be changed. Please try again. If the error persists, please send a new e-mail or contact support.
